agreements: All agents identify Arbiter gating (T46.1) and feat/spec-auto-telemetry completion as prerequisites before implementation work can proceed.

Validation must include doc lint, tasks lint, nightly drift dry-run, and HAL telemetry capture with artifacts stored under docs/SPEC-OPS-004-integrated-coder-hooks/evidence/commands/SPEC-KIT-030-add-documentation-for-rebasing-from/.

conflicts.issue: Gemini/Claude/gpt_codex outputs recommend placeholder docs, but policy final checks show implement stage remains gated.
conflicts.resolution: Treat diff proposals as scaffolding only; no documentation should be committed until T46.1 decisions are recorded and policy final passes.

open_actions: Resolve T46.1 Arbiter decisions and update docs/SPEC-KIT-030-add-documentation-for-rebasing-from/arbiter-decisions.md.
Capture missing implement-stage agent outputs (gemini/claude/gpt_codex) after gating clears and store them alongside synthesis.
Rerun spec-ops-implement to achieve passing policy final check and log evidence (.log files) in the tracked directory.
